* **Submission deadline:** April 12th, 2023, 13:00:00
* **Expected contract start date:** April 17th, 2023
* **Expected contract end date:** March 31st, 2024
* **Region of opportunity:** Canada 
* **Region of delivery:** Nova Scotia, New Brunswick

## **Procurement Details**

* **Trade agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, North American Free Trade Agreement
* **Procurement method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Selection criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Limited tendering reason:** None

## **Statement of Work**

The Correctional Service of Canada requires Heavy Equipment Services for excavation, snow removal, and clearance services on an as-and-when-required basis. The services will be performed at various locations in Atlantic Canada. The contractor must provide labour, including licensed heavy equipment operators, tools, supplies, and equipment, including heavy equipment such as an excavator, bulldozer, loader, backhoe, tandem truck, compactor, and other specialized equipment.

The contractor must be located within 50 km of the sites and be able to deliver services in English. The services will be performed from April 17th, 2023, to March 31st, 2024, with the option to renew for four (4) additional one-year periods.
